targets.query: SELECT distinct("AC_POWER_OUT") FROM "solar_data" WHERE ("deviceName" = 'XT-1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT distinct("AC_POWER_OUT") FROM "solar_data" WHERE ("deviceName" = 'XT-2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("AC_CURRENT_OUT") FROM "solar_data" WHERE ("deviceName" = '${deviceName}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

select max(PV_ENERGY_PREV_DAY) from solar_data where deviceName='VT-1' and time > now() - 7d group by time(1d)
select max(PV_ENERGY_PREV_DAY) from solar_data where deviceName='VT-2' and time > now() - 7d group by time(1d)
select difference(max(PV_ENERGY_TOTAL)) from solar_data where deviceName='VT-1' and  $timeFilter group by time(1h)
select difference(max(PV_ENERGY_TOTAL)) from solar_data where deviceName='VT-2' and  $timeFilter group by time(1h)
